name: UNLEASHIA Glacier Vegan Lip Balm No.1 Blue Lagoon
description: UNLEASHIA Glacier Vegan Lip Balm No.1 Blue Lagoon is a hydrating lip balm formulated with vegan ingredients to nourish and protect your lips. Infused with the refreshing essence of Blue Lagoon, it provides long-lasting moisture and a hint of color.
usage: Apply liberally to lips as often as needed.

reviews.author: LipBalmLover123
reviews.comment: Absolutely love this lip balm! It keeps my lips hydrated throughout the day and has a lovely scent. Highly recommend.

reviews.author: BeautyFanatic
reviews.comment: Overall, a great lip balm. Provides good hydration and I adore the packaging. Only downside is it can feel a bit waxy initially.

extraInfo: Cruelty-free, paraben-free, made with natural ingredients.

name: UNLEASHIA Glacier Vegan Lip Balm No.2 Blue Lagoon
description: UNLEASHIA Glacier Vegan Lip Balm No.2 Blue Lagoon is a nourishing lip balm infused with the essence of Blue Lagoon. Its vegan formula provides long-lasting hydration and protection for your lips, leaving them soft and smooth.
usage: Apply to lips as needed throughout the day for moisturization and a subtle tint of color.

reviews.author: LipBalmAddict
reviews.comment: This lip balm is amazing! It keeps my lips hydrated and has a delightful scent. I'm impressed!

reviews.author: BeautyEnthusiast
reviews.comment: It's a decent lip balm for hydration, but I find myself reapplying frequently throughout the day.

extraInfo: Vegan, cruelty-free, and free of parabens.

name: UNLEASHIA Glacier Vegan Lip Balm No.3 Blue Lagoon
description: UNLEASHIA Glacier Vegan Lip Balm No.3 Blue Lagoon is a luxurious lip balm infused with the essence of Blue Lagoon. Its nourishing formula provides intense hydration, leaving your lips soft and supple.
usage: Apply liberally to lips whenever they feel dry for instant moisture and comfort.

reviews.author: LipCareLover
reviews.comment: This lip balm is my new favorite! It keeps my lips hydrated all day long without needing constant reapplication.

reviews.author: BeautyBlogger123
reviews.comment: I really enjoy using this lip balm. It provides excellent hydration and has a pleasant scent, but it's a bit on the pricey side.

extraInfo: Formulated without sulfates, phthalates, and synthetic fragrances.

name: UNLEASHIA Glacier Vegan Lip Balm No.4 Blue Lagoon
description: UNLEASHIA Glacier Vegan Lip Balm No.4 Blue Lagoon is a soothing lip balm enriched with the essence of Blue Lagoon. Its hydrating formula provides immediate relief to dry, chapped lips, leaving them feeling soft and smooth.
usage: Apply to lips as often as needed for hydration and protection against environmental aggressors.

reviews.author: LipBalmObsessed
reviews.comment: I'm obsessed with this lip balm! It's incredibly moisturizing without feeling sticky. My lips feel amazing after using it.

reviews.author: BeautyJunkie
reviews.comment: This lip balm works wonders for dry lips. Plus, the packaging is adorable! It's a bit expensive, but worth it for the results.

extraInfo: Free of artificial colors, mineral oils, and silicones.

name: UNLEASHIA Glacier Vegan Lip Balm No.5 Blue Lagoon
description: UNLEASHIA Glacier Vegan Lip Balm No.5 Blue Lagoon is a nourishing lip balm enriched with the essence of Blue Lagoon. Its vegan formula provides long-lasting hydration and protection, leaving your lips feeling soft and supple.
usage: Apply to lips as needed throughout the day for moisturization and a hint of color.

reviews.author: LipBalmLover456
reviews.comment: This lip balm is amazing! It keeps my lips hydrated all day and smells wonderful. Highly recommend.

reviews.author: BeautyFanatic987
reviews.comment: I really like this lip balm. It provides good hydration and the packaging is adorable. It can feel a bit waxy at first, but it's not a deal-breaker.

extraInfo: Formulated without parabens, phthalates, and synthetic fragrances.

name: UNLEASHIA Glacier Vegan Lip Balm No.6 Blue Lagoon
description: UNLEASHIA Glacier Vegan Lip Balm No.6 Blue Lagoon is a luxurious lip treatment infused with the essence of Blue Lagoon. Its rich formula deeply nourishes and repairs dry, damaged lips, leaving them smooth and supple.
usage: Apply a generous amount to lips before bedtime for overnight hydration and repair.

reviews.author: LipBalmQueen
reviews.comment: This lip balm is a game-changer! It provides intense hydration and lasts all night. My lips feel amazing in the morning.

reviews.author: BeautyGuru
reviews.comment: I love this lip balm! It repairs my dry lips overnight and feels so luxurious. Definitely worth the splurge.

extraInfo: Free of sulfates, mineral oils, and synthetic dyes.

usage: Apply to lips as needed throughout the day for moisturization and a hint of color.

reviews.author: LipBalmLover789
reviews.comment: This lip balm is fantastic! It keeps my lips hydrated and smells great. Highly recommend.

reviews.author: BeautyFanatic654
reviews.comment: I really enjoy using this lip balm. It provides good hydration and the packaging is cute. It can feel a bit waxy at first, but it's not a big issue.

extraInfo: Formulated without parabens, phthalates, and synthetic fragrances.
